data.eml:eml: A new genus for Psopheticus megalops Takeda, 1989 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Goneplacidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L., Komai, Tomoyuki (2011): A new genus for Psopheticus megalops Takeda, 1989 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Goneplacidae). Zootaxa 2934: 61-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203270
